title: To stream or not to stream?

replies.body:
Whether tis Nobler in the mind to suffer the slings and arrows of Streaming fortune. :P

Sure, stream.
replies.body_tagged:
Whether tis Nobler in the mind to suffer the slings and arrows of Streaming fortune. :P

replies.body:
if streaming makes you steaming, then don't

If streaming makes you laughing, then do.
